inputs.label: Okteto namespace:
inputs.tutorial: Specifies the okteto namespace you want to use, (empty for default)
inputs.name: okteto_namespace

inputs.label: Github auth clientId:
inputs.tutorial: Specifies your Github auth provider clientId, more details at https://docs.platform.vee.codes/devportal/getStart/installation
inputs.name: github_client_id

inputs.label: Github auth clientSecret:
inputs.tutorial: Specifies your Github auth provider clientSecret, more details at https://docs.platform.vee.codes/devportal/getStart/installation
inputs.name: github_client_secret

inputs.label: Github organization name:
inputs.tutorial: Specifies your Github organization, more details at https://docs.platform.vee.codes/devportal/getStart/installation
inputs.name: github_client_organization

inputs.tutorial: Specifies your Github personal access token
inputs.name: github_token
